titleStmt.title: Noli me tangere, or, A thing to be thought on. Scilicet, vox carnis sacræ clamantis ab altare ad aquilam sacrilegam, noli me tangere, ne te perdam.
titleStmt.author: Udall, Ephraim, d. 1647.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Ephraim Udall. cf. BM.

Has added engraved half-title, signed "W. Marshall sculp. 1642.", has varying title: "Noli me tangere is a thinge to be thought on, or, Vox carnis sacræ clamantis ab altari ad aquilam sacrilegam Noli me tangere ne te perdam".
Imperfect: imprint cropped; imprint supplied from Wing.
A defense of church property and plan for church reform.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
